title: Can't Install/Uninstall "Contact Local Tech Support?"
body:
Events (chronological)
-game kept crashing
-tried repair (didn't work)
-Uninstalled (files still there but "program" gone)
-Reinstalled (tried to)
-Reinstall told me to find league file
-tried Hextech repair Tool
-was told to contact "Local Tech Support"
help......

replies.body:
When you ran the Hextech Repair Tool, did you check the boxes for *both* "reinstall" AND "clean uninstall"? This is to ensure no local files are kept in the C:\Riot Games directory that could cause reinstallation failures.

Let me know, thanks!
